alert.note: Alert for Cross (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:38PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cross County through 615 PM CDT... At 538 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cherry Valley, or 9 miles northwest of Parkin, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wynne, Cherry Valley, Vanndale, Colton, McElroy, Mersman, Birdeye, Fair Field, River Front, Fitzgerald Crossing, Levesque and Wittsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
